org.ardenus.config

Class GameConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.config.GameConfig

  • public final class GameConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to access the game configuration for the game being ran by the Ardenus engine.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • loadConfig

        public static void loadConfig(ConfigProperty<?>... properties)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the game configuration.
        Parameters:
        properties - the configuration properties that must be present in the game's configuration file. Any missing properties will automatically be stored with the property's respective default value.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • saveConfig

        public static void saveConfig()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the game configuration and writes it to the disk. This can cause a quick freeze, so it is best to only call this when the freeze will not be noticed (e.g., when the state where the configuration is managed is left and/or the game is closed).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • get

        public static <T> T get(ConfigProperty<T> property)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of value the configuration property is.
        Parameters:
        property - the configuration property to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the value of the property.

        public static <T> void set(ConfigProperty<T> property,
                           T value)
        Sets the specified configuration property.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of value the configuration property is.
        Parameters:
        property - the configuration property to set.
        value - the value to set the configuration property to.

        public static <T> void setDefault(ConfigProperty<T> property)

        public static <T> void remove(ConfigProperty<T> property)
